participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and enthusiastic, enjoys family activities and cooking.
participant_1.background: I'm grilling a lot of meat for my family this weekend. I never sleep in. I like movies based on comedies. I live in Pittsburgh and love it, although I do miss my children when I'm away on work trips. I'm looking for ways to control my blood sugar while still being able to enjoy my active lifestyle.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Active and family-oriented, values quality time with loved ones.
participant_2.background: I enjoy lifting weights on my days off to stay in shape. I am a 35-year-old father of two who enjoys spending time with my family. My parents died when I was young, so my sister and I had to take care of each other. I am bald. I took my family camping and let my dogs run around.

content.text: Good! My kids are off from school today so we're camping!
Oh that sounds fun! I'm at work, I'm a chef and it's crazy busy today. I don't have to be back until 5, so I'm probably going to go home and sleep.
Aw man, that sounds rough! I do miss my sleep ins! What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love making pasta dishes! I'm a pretty good cook, I used to be a chef too! I just had a kid so I took a break to be a stay at home mom, but I'm ready to get back into the kitchen.
That's awesome! What kind of pasta dishes do you like to make? I love spaghetti!
My favorite is lasagna! I love making it from scratch. I also love making pesto pasta and fettuccine Alfredo.
Those all sound delicious! I'm not that good of a cook, but I love to eat!
I'm sure you're better than you think! My husband is the same way, he can't cook at all but he loves to eat.
Haha! I'll take your word for it!
So what kind of camping are you doing? Are you in a tent? Or do you have an RV?
We're in a tent! We're in a state park with our dogs. It's really nice out here.
That sounds amazing! I love camping! I'm so jealous
